import React, { useState } from "react"; function Timeline() { const [height, setHeight] = useState("15%") var boxes = document.getElementsByClassName("ag-timeline-card_point") window.addEventListener("scroll", function(){ //1070 const epsilon = 1 var idx = 1 var winScroll = document.body.scrollTop || document.documentElement.scrollTop; var height = document.documentElement.scrollHeight - document.documentElement.clientHeight - 1070; var scrolled = (winScroll / height ) * 100; setHeight(scrolled + "%") console.log("idx=" + idx + "scrolled" + scrolled) switch((scrolled - idx*30) < epsilon){ case true: idx = idx + 1 boxes[idx].setAttribute("id","js-ag-active") break; default: } }); return(
Timeline
2020
2022
2023
2024
) } export default Timeline;
